(The presiding Dharma teacher greets the one outside with a question.
He enters first.
The two attendants follow him.
After the incense and lantern are lit, he inspects the fire.
He then enters.
The inner altar is attended to.
Everything that's displayed on the inner altar should be stored with respect.
It should be stored with respect.

source_sentence: 焚陪位疏緞於壇下柵內)。
translation: The accompanying satin bowl is burned inside the grating beneath the altar.)
(On this day, he performs the yoga ceremony with his mouth agape.
At the end of the day, it's the first day of the ceremony.
He puts away the accompanying tablet. (If it's a long-standing reason, he can put the name of the most important person who's being sponsored.
You can change the names of the most important people who are being sponsored.
You can have the names of the most important people who are being presented with the ceremony translated into a companion seat.
This is so that they can always serve at the Dharma assembly.)

source_sentence: 法界聖凡水陸大齋普利道場性相通論卷第八
translation: Dharma Realm of Saints and Worldlings, Suiru Dazhai, and the Nature of the Way, Xiangtong lun, vol. 8
